fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You can wallow, sob, or weep each night.
> _ _
> Wallow: Wallow at someone's doorstep, roleblocking them and all their visitors.
> Sob: Sob alongside someone, causing them to be roleblock whoever they next visit.
> Weep: Weep into the world, roleblocking every non-Town role in the game. (One use)
> _ _
> Additionally, those that visit you will be depressed and are roleblocked the following night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who would oppose the town.
